hints.content:
Max started with $\goldE{60}$ balloons.

![A number line is labeled 60  on the right side and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a7d111f00e6b3caf1ca74e3c56b0bb41c996a205)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

He gave away $\maroonD{15}$ balloons to his friend.

![From the right at 60 with minus 15 goes to 45.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/40baaa6099476657a88681231fe2f485e077e0e2)

$\goldE{60} - \maroonD{15} = 45$

Then he gave away $\purpleD{15}$ balloons to his sister.

![From the right at 60 with minus 15 goes to 45. From 45 minus 15 goes to 30. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b7d7514a12d499526dd82e33dce4f2e4362431f5)

$45 - \purpleD{15} =30$

Last, he gave $\blueE{11}$ balloons to his dog.

![A number line starts at 19 on the left and goes to 60 on the right. From the right at 60 with minus 15 goes to 45. From 45 minus 15 goes to 30. From 30 minus 11 goes to 19.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/08812de35371b6b1d755f07c9bac96be862b780e)

$30 - \blueE{11} = 19$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 60 on the right. From the right at 60 with minus 15 goes to 45. From 45 minus 15 goes to 30. From 30 minus 11 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da4a6100ff5fce67b7aeabcf018a1ae419795aee)

Max had ${19}$ balloons left.

question.content:
For his birthday, Max had $60$ balloons.  

He gave $15$ balloons to a friend, $15$ balloons to his sister, and $11$ balloons to a dog.         

**Which number line shows how to find how many balloons Max has left?**

[[☃ radio 1]]  

**How many balloons does Max have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] balloons

choices.content: ![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 60 on the right. From the right at 60 with minus 15 goes to 45. From 45 minus 15 goes to 30. From 30 minus 11 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da4a6100ff5fce67b7aeabcf018a1ae419795aee)

![A number line starts at ? on the left and goes to 100 on the right. From the right at 100 with minus 15 goes to 85. From 85 minus 15 goes to 70. From 70 minus 11 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8514b4f0861a714edcede92d54a1375cfa21c326)
